website_summaries.verdict: This little fridge won't hold plans for the Death Star, but the Bb8-shaped cooler will keep drinks and snacks as cold as Hoth.
pros: The fridge also can switch functions to become a food warmer
Great for an office or bedroom
cons: This unit is very small and will only hold the equivalent of about 6 beverage cans at a time

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pumping at Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mini fridge for my classroom, to use while I was pumping at work. It has a removable shelf and, when removed, can hold 2 assembled pumps. If using medela bottles, it could probably fit 6 if they were stacked horizontally. The directions say not to leave it on for an extended period of time, so I try to turn it off overnight or every couple of days. Great for pumping teachers, or mom's who want to keep their expressed milk in a cleaner, more private fridge.
customer_reviews.author: REG

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking frig, careful of the hot setting
customer_reviews.text: It is a neat frig. Bought it for my 12yr old and he really likes it despite it not being overly practical. You really can only fit a few sodas but I knew that going into it. One concerning thing. The HOT setting gets really hot! One of my kids accidentally switched it from cold to hot. It boiled two cans of soda and blew them up, the force opened the frig door and made a big mess! Not really any fault of the frig but definitely something to consider if this is going in a kids room. I assumed it was more of a "warming" option, not boiling.
customer_reviews.author: Ovid

customer_reviews.title: Very cold and very quiet
customer_reviews.text: This mini fridge is the perfect size for my desk at work. It keeps my drinks very cold and it's surprisingly quiet. You can fit a six pack comfortably in this fridge, but not much more than that. It has a shelf that will allow you to fit as many 4 soda cans at the bottom and perhaps a couple sandwiches on top. There's also a "warm" setting to keep things warm, but I haven't used that feature yet. There are many mini fridges out there, but I chose this one because it's Star Wars..
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Fan

customer_reviews.title: Really, really small
customer_reviews.text: We bought this with the knowledge that it was small and would fit only a 6-pcak at best. What it doesn't say is that that 6-pack has to be played down on their side. Not sanding up. Also we needed this unit to run continuously. The directions state that it is to be used for 3 days maximum and then turned off for a minimum of 8 hours. Sadly we are disappointed in this item. It was returned as not being advertised properly. Be careful when you buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Ryberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son thinks this was the best gift ever at Christmas. He took it to use at work.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi K

customer_reviews.title: BB-8 Mini Refrigerator!  A must have a for any BB-8 fan.
customer_reviews.text: Great small 6 pack cooler/refrigerator for your desk top. Works well and gets a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ottaviano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small, but cute. I use it for my reptiles food.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Goose

customer_reviews.title: Stars Wars saves the day
customer_reviews.text: I love my new mini fridge. It keeps my items nice and cold and doesn't take up a lot of space.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very very small

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift, recipient loved it. fits 6 cans just fine or a bottle or two of water. keeps items very cold. makes a little bit of a fan noise but not enough to really annoy or cause them not to use it.

customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his Birthday and he loves it. For the price it is very small but he uses it for his insulin so he doesn't have to keep his meds with his food.

customer_reviews.title: I like this fridge but the handle broke within the first ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this fridge but the handle broke within the first few weeks. You open it by turning the handle either right or left, now we can only open it by turning it left. Seems a shame given how much it costs.
customer_reviews.author: SLMU

customer_reviews.title: Loved it

customer_reviews.text: completely impractical sizing unless it’s for a child. plus i had to pay $10 to return it. extremely disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Its the perfect size for his play area
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this refrigerator. Its the perfect size for his play area.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food well chilled
customer_reviews.text: very very happy and satisfied! i've been using this product since May 2016 (after my son was born). Durable, with cool design. It can really keep any liquid and food well chilled. I placed this in our room & used it to store bottle of unfinished baby milk so when he wakes up in the middle of the night i will just warm it up with the bottle warmer, very convenient for both me and my husband. Easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: jmth

customer_reviews.title: Fridge works great. Bought for my 15 year old son to ...
customer_reviews.text: Fridge works great. Bought for my 15 year old son to keep in his room. He usually keeps soda cans and chocolate milk in there. It does make a soft humming noise when plugged in. Nothing annoying. We have loved this little fridge. Keeps drinks nice and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Book Diet

customer_reviews.title: Very small fridge
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is TINY. I thought that it would be bigger. I have not plugged it in yet because it is a Christmas present for my son, so I will update the review after that. Very disappointed in the size of it though!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Ro

product_meta.title: Star Wars New World Premier Bb8 4 Liter Mini Fridge
product_meta.description: This official star wars licensed bb8 mini fridge. The 4 liter mini fridge holds up to six cans of beverage. Each style of fridge has a hot and cold function and a carry handle. Function *contents 1x bb8 cooler, x1 mains power lead, x1 car 12v lead - powered by ac 110v or dc 12v electric supply.
feature_bullets: Officially licensed-star wars bb8 4 liter mini fridge
4 Liter mini fridge holds up to 6 cans of your favorite beverage
This mini fridge beats all with its heat and cool function
Travel with bb8 using the car adaptor
Last note: this fridge heats and cools and can be plugged into your car

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars52 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
